text:
Worth Street, Central Street, to Mission Place: (After Reconstruction).

 August 2, 1920.

(1) Centre Street, west side, north from Worth Street. This view
shows the tombs.
February 24, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, showing a further view north on Centre Street. Also shown is Leohard Street, west from Centre, to and including Lafayette Streets. Included also is Lafayette Street, west side, north from but not including Leonard, to but not including Franklin Streets. In the foreground is shown a clearance for the Department of Health Building.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

(1) Centre Street, west side, north from Worth Street. This view
shows the tombs.
February 24, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, showing a further view north on Centre Street. Also shown is Leohard Street, west from Centre, to and including Lafayette Streets. Included also is Lafayette Street, west side, north from but not including Leonard, to but not including Franklin Streets. In the foreground is shown a clearance for the Department of Health Building.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

(1) Foley Square, (in the foreground,) showing the new State Building, on Centre Street; north from and including Worth Street; to, and including Leonard Street. Also shown is Worth Street, east from and including Centre Street, to, but not including Baxter Street.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same view, from a different angle.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same view, from a different angle, showing the site for the new Department of Health Building. The view also shows Leonard Street, south side, from and including Centre Street, to and including Baxter Street.

March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(1) Foley Square, (in the foreground,) showing the new State Building, on Centre Street; north from and including Worth Street; to, and including Leonard Street. Also shown is Worth Street, east from and including Centre Street, to, but not including Baxter Street.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same view, from a different angle.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same view, from a different angle, showing the site for the new Department of Health Building. The view also shows Leonard Street, south side, from and including Centre Street, to and including Baxter Street.

March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(1) Foley Square, (in the foreground,) showing the new State Building, on Centre Street; north from and including Worth Street; to, and including Leonard Street. Also shown is Worth Street, east from and including Centre Street, to, but not including Baxter Street.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same view, from a different angle.

March 26, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same view, from a different angle, showing the site for the new Department of Health Building. The view also shows Leonard Street, south side, from and including Centre Street, to and including Baxter Street.

March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

Worth Street, west from and including Centre Street.  On the extreme right, appears a portion of the N.Y. State Building.

October 22, 1932
P. L. Sperr.

Foley Square: The New York State Bldg. as viewed eastward from Lafayette at Worth Streets. This structure, No. 80 Centre Street, is also bounded, by Worth, Leonard and Baxter Streets and was the first building erected here of this civic center. The latest is the Board of Health structure and is seen on the left. To the right appears a portion of the New York County Court House.

June 12, 1938.

P. L. Sperr
